title: Suburban Love Song
description: Carrie Gould can’t find her way at home.So she hangs with those on the edge.Black clothes, loud music, cheap liquor, cheaper sex. And they laugh.Cause it’s all so damn funny. And if they didn’t laugh, they might cry.Ben's home is broken, but he isn’t.He is solid, true, steady, love.She says come laugh with me.He says come love me.She says, "I’ll try for now."He says he will forever.The sweet, funny, sexy story that makes you remember all the good times with your friends, the parties, the bad relationships, and young love.This book is recommended for readers age 17 and older due to sexual content.
author: Karen  Gordon
